job_description: Ocean Sonics (www.OceanSonics.com) is a world-class innovation house that designs andmanufactures smart hydrophones for leaders in ocean observation, ocean research, offshore energyand ocean industries.Application Software Developer (Co-op)Ocean Sonics has an opportunity for a co-op software developer at our main office in Great Village,Nova Scotia. Join a team of design experts who are tackling real-world technical problems. We havebeen a co-op employer for over 4 years.About the RoleOur innovation team consists of experts in hardware, firmware and software. You will have broadexperience in software development, design and architecture with a focus on connectivity and datapresentation.This role is both high-level and hands-on.Your role will include:•    Development of usable, scalable and feature-rich software•    Software architecture planning/design OutcomesLearn about software standards, problem solving, hardware and software integration, C development,vendor and customer relations, working in a business environment as part of a team.Relocation:There is car-pooling assistance available from Truro and Bible Hill to the office in Great Village.Many of the employees car pool to reduce the environmental impact and save money on gas. PreviousCo-op students found the car pool very convenient especially if they did not have a vehicle. It isa great way to meet the other employees.Reasonably priced accommodations are available in the Truro area due to the presence of DalhousieAgricultural Campus.
job_requirements: Position Requirements•    Co-op in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent•    Exposure to software developmentExperience with the following tools is desirable:•     The C and C++ and programming language•     HTML/CSS, JavaScript•    Software development in a Linux environment•     Source code control•     Microsoft Office applications•    Embedded/Microprocessor environments•    Software debug and performance analysis tools•    Human-machine interface design•     Software testing and quality control Open To All Majors:No
